creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Asagao no/ hanada no iro no/ hatsu-gatsuo/ ni no konu uchi to/ yodōshi ni kuru (Look at the color of the first bonitos!/ They are as blue as/ morning glories./ No wander thet came along [to market]/ before the sun rises.)

by Toshinokado Haruki

Kamakura no/ Yukinoshita naru/ hatsu-gatsuo/ fukume ba kiyu ru/ ajiwai zo yoki (The first bonito/ caught on the beach/ near the place called Ubder Snow/ melts like snow in my mouth./ How tasty it is!)

by Toshiiori Machikado
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Untitled series of fish known as Large Fish
signed: Ichiryūsai Hiroshige ga 一立斎広重画
title: Bonito and Saxifrage
